verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Gather yourselves <S%H622>together,<s%> that I may <S%H5046>tell<s%> you <S%H853>that<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H7122>befall<s%> you in the <S%H319>last<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
Gather yourselves <S%H6908>together,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear,<s%> ye <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> your <S%H1>father.<s%>

Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> my <S%H3581>might,<s%> and the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of my <S%H202>strength,<s%> the <S%H3499>excellency<s%> of <S%H7613>dignity,<s%> and the <S%H3499>excellency<s%> of power: <S%H5794><s%>

Unstable <S%H6349><s%> as <S%H4325>water,<s%> thou shalt <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3498>excel;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thou wentest <S%H5927>up<s%> to thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H4904>bed;<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H2490>defiledst<s%> thou it: he went <S%H5927>up<s%> to my <S%H3326>couch.<s%>
Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and <S%H3878>Levi<s%> are <S%H251>brethren;<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H2555>cruelty<s%> are in their <S%H4380>habitations.<s%>

O my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thou into their <S%H5475>secret;<s%> unto their <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> mine <S%H3519>honor,<s%> be <S%H408>not<s%> thou <S%H3161>united:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in their <S%H639>anger<s%> they <S%H2026>slew<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> and in their <S%H7522>self-will<s%> they digged <S%H6131>down<s%> a <S%H7791>wall.<s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be their <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it was <S%H5794>fierce;<s%> and their <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it was <S%H7185>cruel:<s%> I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> them in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Judah, <S%H3063><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art he whom thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise:<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be in the <S%H6203>neck<s%> of thine <S%H341>enemies;<s%> thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> shall bow <S%H7812>down<s%> before thee.

Judah <S%H3063><s%> is a <S%H738>lion's<s%> <S%H1482>whelp:<s%> from the <S%H4480>prey,<s%> <S%H2964><s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> thou art gone <S%H5927>up:<s%> he stooped <S%H3766>down,<s%> he <S%H7257>couched<s%> as a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and as an old <S%H3833>lion;<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> shall rouse him <S%H6965>up?<s%>

The <S%H7626>scepter<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H4480>Judah,<s%> <S%H3063><s%> nor a <S%H2710>lawgiver<s%> from <S%H4480>between<s%> <S%H996><s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7886>Shiloh<s%> <S%H935>come;<s%> and unto him shall the <S%H3349>gathering<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> be.

Binding <S%H631><s%> his <S%H5895>foal<s%> unto the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and his <S%H860>ass's<s%> <S%H1121>colt<s%> unto the choice <S%H8321>vine;<s%> he <S%H3526>washed<s%> his <S%H3830>garments<s%> in <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and his <S%H5497>clothes<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of grapes: <S%H6025><s%>
His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be <S%H2447>red<s%> with <S%H4480>wine,<s%> <S%H3196><s%> and his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> with <S%H4480>milk.<s%> <S%H2461><s%>

Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> at the <S%H2348>haven<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> shall be for a <S%H2348>haven<s%> of <S%H591>ships;<s%> and his <S%H3411>border<s%> shall be <S%H5921>unto<s%> <S%H6721>Zidon.<s%>
Issachar <S%H3485><s%> is a <S%H1634>strong<s%> <S%H2543>ass<s%> couching <S%H7257>down<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> two burdens: <S%H4942><s%>

And he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H4496>rest<s%> was <S%H2896>good,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> it was <S%H5276>pleasant;<s%> and <S%H5186>bowed<s%> his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%> to <S%H5445>bear,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5647>servant<s%> unto <S%H4522>tribute.<s%>
Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way,<s%> an <S%H8207>adder<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H734>path,<s%> that <S%H5391>biteth<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H6119>heels,<s%> so that his <S%H7392>rider<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H268>backward.<s%>
I have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for thy <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Gad, <S%H1410><s%> a <S%H1416>troop<s%> shall <S%H1464>overcome<s%> him: but <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H1464>overcome<s%> at the <S%H6119>last.<s%>
Out of <S%H4480>Asher<s%> <S%H836><s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall be <S%H8082>fat,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> <S%H4428>royal<s%> <S%H4574>dainties.<s%>
Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> is a <S%H355>hind<s%> let <S%H7971>loose:<s%> he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H8233>goodly<s%> <S%H561>words.<s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>bough,<s%> even a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>bough<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> a <S%H5869>well;<s%> whose <S%H1323>branches<s%> <S%H6805>run<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the wall: <S%H7791><s%>
The <S%H1167>archers<s%> <S%H2671><s%> have sorely <S%H4843>grieved<s%> him, and <S%H7232>shot<s%> at him, and <S%H7852>hated<s%> him:

But his <S%H7198>bow<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in <S%H386>strength,<s%> and the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> were made <S%H6339>strong<s%> by the <S%H4480>hands<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H46>mighty<s%> God of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> (from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> is the <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478>)<s%>

Even by the <S%H4480>God<s%> <S%H410><s%> of thy <S%H1>father,<s%> who shall <S%H5826>help<s%> thee; and by the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> who shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee with <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H5920><s%> <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> that <S%H7257>lieth<s%> <S%H8478>under,<s%> <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of the <S%H7699>breasts,<s%> and of the womb: <S%H7356><s%>

The <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%> have <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of my <S%H2029>progenitors<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the utmost <S%H8379>bound<s%> of the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1389>hills:<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and on the crown of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of him that was separate <S%H5139>from<s%> his <S%H251>brethren.<s%>

Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> shall <S%H2963>ravin<s%> as a <S%H2061>wolf:<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> he shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H5706>prey,<s%> and at <S%H6153>night<s%> he shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> is it <S%H834>that<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto them, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them; every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H834><s%> according to his <S%H1293>blessing<s%> he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them.

And he <S%H6680>charged<s%> them, and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H589>I<s%> am to be <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H6912>bury<s%> me <S%H413>with<s%> my <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H4631>cave<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%>

In the <S%H4631>cave<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a burial <S%H6913>place.<s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H802>wife;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> I <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3812>Leah.<s%>
The <S%H4735>purchase<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> and of the <S%H4631>cave<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is therein was <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%>

And when <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6680>commanding<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> he gathered <S%H622>up<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and yielded up the <S%H1478>ghost,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
